name: Media Server Stack
title: Complete Media Server with VPN
description: Full media server stack with VPN (Gluetun), media management (Sonarr/Radarr), torrent client (qBittorrent), and streaming (Jellyfin/Plex). Includes request management via Jellyseerr.

env.label: VPN Service Provider
env.name: VPN_SERVICE_PROVIDER
env.description: VPN service provider (e.g., surfshark, nordvpn, expressvpn)

env.label: OpenVPN Username
env.name: OPENVPN_USER
env.description: Your VPN provider username (required for OpenVPN)

env.label: OpenVPN Password
env.name: OPENVPN_PASSWORD
env.description: Your VPN provider password (required for OpenVPN)

env.label: WireGuard Private Key
env.name: WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Your WireGuard private key (required for WireGuard)

env.label: Plex Claim Token
env.name: PLEX_CLAIM
env.description: Get from https://www.plex.tv/claim (optional, expires in 4 minutes)

note: Includes Gluetun VPN for secure torrent downloads. Configure VPN credentials before deployment.
